member.name: T:MBN.Utils.Caching.KetamaNodeLocator
member.summary: Implements Ketama cosistent hashing, compatible with the "spymemcached" Java client

member.name: M:MBN.Utils.Caching.KetamaNodeLocator.#ctor
member.summary: Initialized a new instance of the using the default hash algorithm.

member.name: M:MBN.Utils.Caching.KetamaNodeLocator.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialized a new instance of the using a custom hash algorithm.
member.param:
The name of the hash algorithm to use.
NameDescription
md5Equivalent of System.Security.Cryptography.MD5
sha1Equivalent of System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1
tigerTiger Hash
crcCRC32
fnv1_32FNV Hash 32bit
fnv1_64FNV Hash 64bit
fnv1a_32Modified FNV Hash 32bit
fnv1a_64Modified FNV Hash 64bit
murmurMurmur Hash
oneatatimeJenkin's "One at A time Hash"
member.remarks: If the hashName does not match any of the item on the list it will be passed to HashAlgorithm.Create.

member.name: T:MBN.Utils.Caching.KetamaNodeLocator.LookupData
member.summary: this will encapsulate all the indexes we need for lookup so the instance can be reinitialized without locking in case an IMemcachedConfig implementation returns the same instance form the CreateLocator()

member.name: P:MBN.Utils.Helper.CI_Pagination.NumLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of "digit" links before and after the selected page number.

member.name: P:MBN.Utils.Helper.CI_Pagination.CurPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the current selected page.

members.member:
Gets or sets the text to be shown in the "first" link on the left.
[XmlAttribute("FirstLink")]

Gets or sets the text to be shown in the "next" page link.
[XmlAttribute("NextLink")]

Gets or sets the text to be shown in the "previous" page link.
[XmlAttribute("PrevLink")]

Gets or sets the text to be shown in the "last" link on the right.
[XmlAttribute("LastLink")]

Gets or sets the opening tag placed on the left side of the entire result.
[XmlAttribute("FullTagOpen")]

Gets or sets the closing tag placed on the right side of the entire result.
[XmlAttribute("FullTagClose")]

Gets or sets the opening tag for the "first" link.
[XmlAttribute("FirstTagOpen")]

Gets or sets the closing tag for the "first" link.
[XmlAttribute("FirstTagClose")]

Gets or sets the opening tag for the "last" link.
[XmlAttribute("LastTagOpen")]

Gets or sets the closing tag for the "last" link.
[XmlAttribute("LastTagClose")]

Gets or sets the opening tag for the "current" link.
[XmlAttribute("CurTagOpen")]

Gets or sets the closing tag for the "current" link.
[XmlAttribute("CurTagClose")]

Gets or sets the opening tag for the "next" link.
[XmlAttribute("NextTagOpen")]

Gets or sets the closing tag for the "next" link.
[XmlAttribute("NextTagClose")]

Gets or sets the opening tag for the "previous" link.
[XmlAttribute("PrevTagOpen")]

Gets or sets the closing tag for the "previous" link.
[XmlAttribute("PrevTagClose")]

Gets or sets the opening tag for the "digit" link.
[XmlAttribute("NumTagOpen")]

Gets or sets the closing tag for the "digit" link.
[XmlAttribute("NumTagClose")]

Gets or sets the opening tag for the "Item".
[XmlAttribute("ItemTagOpen")]

Gets or sets the closing tag for the "Item".
[XmlAttribute("ItemTagClose")]

Gets or sets the item type.
[XmlAttribute("ItemType")]

Gets or sets the total number of pages
[XmlAttribute("NumPages")]
